item.title:
@KordingLab 1. Moving past traditional measures. A great ex. is Winding et al Science 2023, where they develop network exploration that provide system neuro insights.
2. Correlating scales. How to think about genetic, protein, and connectomes together? Eg in neurodev (my Neuron/PNAS papers)

item.title: Limitations that I can see: a) Postprocessing takes very long, probably similar to light field microscopy b) 13 sequentially scanned low-NA beams accumulate 13x more PMT noise than a single beam. I wonder how well the method would fare with very low SNR levels in general.
item.description: Limitations that I can see: a) Postprocessing takes very long, probably similar to light field microscopy b) 13 sequentially scanned low-NA beams accumulate 13x more PMT noise than a single beam. I wonder how well the method would fare with very low SNR levels in general.
item.content:encoded: Limitations that I can see: a) Postprocessing takes very long, probably similar to light field microscopy b) 13 sequentially scanned low-NA beams accumulate 13x more PMT noise than a single beam. I wonder how well the method would fare with very low SNR levels in general.
